title: Wear Steam Gears Animated
summary: New and Updated! Works with the new Android Wear Lollipop!
developerAddress: 2301-1625 blvd de Maisonneuve, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3H 2N4
description: IMPORTANT:- The gears are fully animated- When your screen is dimmed or off, the watch animation stops to save your battery! This actually makes this watch consume much less battery than you would think!Enjoy this premium watch face crafted by hand!Only from Curlball Co.https://www.facebook.com/CurlballCo
descriptionHTML:
IMPORTANT:
- The gears are fully animated
- When your screen is dimmed or off, the watch animation stops to save your battery! This actually makes this watch consume much less battery than you would think!

Enjoy this premium watch face crafted by hand!


Only from Curlball Co.
https://www.facebook.com/CurlballCo
comments: It works for about 5 seconds but then keeps failing on my lg g watch r

Stopped working all of a sudden This was a nice feature untill it stopped working. I uninstalled it and reinstalled it and still does not work. This is not worth it if it stops working. This was on the note edge. I will change this review once this problem is repaired. Also very hard to contact the programmer to let them know about this problem because i do not use facebook.
Nice Just what I've been looking for. Now please make some similar ones so I can switch it up. Something more like Stuhrling watches.
Stopped working after lollipop update on moto 360 This was working fine but stopped working after lollipop update on moto 360.  Please update
Loved the face Since the last update it no longer works.
recentChanges: Support for the newest Android Wear and Official watch API
